description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 21 June 2022 (RN: 22/01467/FULL) for the: Excavation of a single storey basement beneath rear part of building and the mews building (including a replacement swimming pool), insertion of new lightwell and amendments to rooflight configuration between the main house and mews building, rear infill of mews building at first floor level, installation of plant to front vaults and within existing roof service rooms and associated external alterations. (Site includes 8 Kinnerton Street). Namely, to allow increase the size of the approved basement extension by approximately 5200mm towards the Wilton Crescent end of the property.
